mapper.select: SELECT board_id as boardId , user_id as userId , title , image , content , gen_address as genAddress , det_address as detAddress , update_date as updateDate , week , tag_big_name as tagBigName , tag_small_name as tagSmallName , board_count as boardCount , lat as lat , lon as lon from board_db as boardDB WHERE board_id > 0 ORDER BY update_date DESC, board_id desc

SELECT board_id as boardId , user_id as userId , title , content , gen_address as genAddress , update_date as updateDate , week , tag_big_name as tagBigName , board_count as boardCount
FROM board_db
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY updateDate desc LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}

SELECT board_id as boardId , user_id as userId , title , content , gen_address as genAddress , det_address as detAddress , update_date as updateDate , week , tag_big_name as tagBigName , board_count as boardCount , lat , lon
FROM board_db
WHERE gen_address LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or det_address LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY updateDate desc , board_id LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}

SELECT count(*) FROM board_db
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT count(*) FROM board_db
WHERE gen_address LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT board_id as boardId , user_id as userId , title , image , content , gen_address as genAddress , det_address as detAddress , update_date as updateDate , week , tag_big_name as tagBigName , tag_small_name as tagSmallName , board_count as boardCount from board_db as boardDB WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
SELECT count(*) FROM board_db WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT board_id as boardId , user_id as userId , title , content , gen_address as genAddress , update_date as updateDate , week , board_count as boardCount
FROM board_db
ORDER BY boardCount desc LIMIT 0, 6
